qa.name: Alex
qa.appearance: Average build, with distinctive birthmark on left cheek

hf.name: Dr. Eliza Stern
hf.clothing: pristine lab coat over formal attire

json_to_edit.voice_over: I never imagined I'd come face to face with my own creation... and my own destruction.
json_to_edit.description: Alex confronts Dr. Eliza Stern about the Doppelgänger experiment gone wrong.
json_to_edit.name: Confrontation
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Alex confronts Dr. Eliza Stern about the Doppelgänger that has stolen his life.

qa.action: Exterior of a sleek, modern research facility at night, illuminated by harsh lights.

hf.action: Alex enters the vast, sterile laboratory filled with advanced equipment and glowing screens.

tr.action: Dr. Eliza Stern working intently at a complex computer setup, unaware of Alex's presence.

xc.action: Alex's face, a mix of anger and fear as he sees Dr. Stern for the first time.

ka.action: Dr. Stern turns, startled by Alex's presence, and slowly stands up from her chair.

fn.action: From Alex's perspective, we see Dr. Stern's face, a mixture of surprise and calculated calm.

af.action: Alex and Dr. Stern face off, engaged in an intense conversation about the Doppelgänger experiment.

qo.action: Dr. Stern's eyes, revealing a flicker of remorse amidst her scientific curiosity.

fp.sfx_keywords: slamming hand on table, rattling equipment
fp.action: Alex, overwhelmed with emotion, slams his hand on a nearby table, causing equipment to rattle.

va.action: Security personnel rush into the lab as an alarm blares, surrounding Alex and Dr. Stern.

edit_command: Add a new shot after every three existing shots. Don't change anything else.

updated_json.voice_over: I never imagined I'd come face to face with my own creation... and my own destruction.
updated_json.description: Alex confronts Dr. Eliza Stern about the Doppelgänger experiment gone wrong.
updated_json.name: Confrontation

hf.action: Alex enters the vast, sterile laboratory filled with advanced equipment and glowing screens.

zx.action: Camera follows Alex as he navigates through rows of mysterious experiments, each more unsettling than the last.

xc.action: Alex's face, a mix of anger and fear as he sees Dr. Stern for the first time.

fn.action: From Alex's perspective, we see Dr. Stern's face, a mixture of surprise and calculated calm.

wy.action: The lab seems to tilt as tension rises, emphasizing the unstable situation and Alex's disorientation.

qo.action: Dr. Stern's eyes, revealing a flicker of remorse amidst her scientific curiosity.

fp.sfx_keywords: slamming hand on table, rattling equipment
fp.action: Alex, overwhelmed with emotion, slams his hand on a nearby table, causing equipment to rattle.

lm.action: A vial of glowing liquid trembles on the edge of the table, threatening to fall and potentially unleash chaos.

va.action: Security personnel rush into the lab as an alarm blares, surrounding Alex and Dr. Stern.

label.rationale: we will add new shots after every three existing shots in the scene, as requested by the edit command. this will increase the total number of shots from 10 to 13. we'll insert creative and relevant new shots that complement the existing scene and maintain the tension and atmosphere. we'll update the "number_of_shots" field and add the new shots to the "shots" dictionary, adjusting the "list_display_order" accordingly. the new shots will be inserted after the 3rd, 6th, and 9th existing shots.

value.sfx_keywords: whirring of robotic arms, distant alarms
